bulk.email.instructions.proofreading: We recommend sending learners no more than one email message per week. Before you send your email, review the text carefully and send it to yourself first, so that you can preview the formatting and make sure embedded images and links work correctly.
When you select Send Email, you are creating a new email message that is added to the queue for sending, and cannot be cancelled.
bulk.email.form.scheduleBox: Schedule this email for a future date
bulk.email.form.error: An error occured while attempting to send the email.
bulk.email.task.alert.editing: You are editing a scheduled email to be sent on: {dateTime}
bulk.email.task.alert.subject: with the subject: {subject}
bulk.email.task.alert.warning: This will not create a new scheduled email task and instead overwrite the one currently selected. Do you want to overwrite this scheduled email?
bulk.email.form.schedule.time.descriptio: Enter a start time, e.g. 09:00 AM
bulk.email.form.dateTime.error: Date and time cannot be blank, and must be a date in the future

bulk.email.scheduled.emails.table.confir: You are deleting an email scheduled to be sent on {date}. The email will not be sent and the scheduling canceled. Are you sure?

bulk.email.content.history.table.viewMes: To read a sent email message, click the `View Message` button within the table.
View the content of previously sent emails
bulk.email.pending.tasks.section.info: Email actions run in the background. The status for any active tasks - including email tasks - appears in the table below.
